channel.title: Getting Dark Bow To Work Perfectly?
channel.description:
well, i am using silabsoft v3 client, and i was wondering, how i got dark bow to run perfectly.. im using funscap3 as my soarce, and i have all items working, and dark bow says "dark bow" when i weild it, and everything is in the right place, all i need ot know, is what to add, and where. and what arrows does it use?
thanks to those of you who can help,
-Liam
